translations: 氧化的；充了氧的；充满氧气的
使氧合（oxygenate 的过去分词）；充氧

sentences.sentence: Under well-oxygenated conditions, microbes produce N2O at low rates.
sentences.translation: 氧气充足的条件下，微生物生成一氧化二氮的速率很低。

sentences.sentence: This is probably because a fetus starved of oxygen will send oxygenated blood to the brain in preference to rest of the body.
sentences.translation: 这可能是因为一个缺乏氧的胚胎会首先把充氧的血液输送到脑部，然后才送到身体的其他部位。

sentences.sentence: If that is the case, the species was able to adapt from anoxic, or oxygen depleted, environments to an era of oxygenated oceans.
sentences.translation: 如果这个理论成立，意味着这种细菌能够适应从缺氧到含氧的海洋环境。
